items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Five of our award-winning mozzarella sticks made completely from scratch, including housemade fresh mozzarella and garlic-herbed breadcrumbs. Served with marinara on the side.

items.name: 12" Sausage Pizza
items.description: The Quad Cities favorite: specially-seasoned housemade crumbled sausage, Roots pizza sauce, and Quad Cities mozzarella blend.

items.name: 12" Garden Pizza
items.description: Roasted mushrooms, diced green peppers, roasted red peppers, olive mix, Roots pizza sauce, and Quad Cities mozzarella blend.
